remarks: Value of the canonical homormorphism from the rational number when the target ring is a division ring.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Oct-2017.)
statement:
qqhval2.0 $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
qqhval2.1 $e |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) $.
qqhval2.2 $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` R ) $.
qqhvval $p |- ( ( ( R e. DivRing /\ ( chr ` R ) = 0 ) /\ Q e. QQ ) -> ( ( QQHom ` R ) ` Q ) = ( ( L ` ( numer ` Q ) ) ./ ( L ` ( denom ` Q ) ) ) ) $.
